name: ALTITUDE (itch) (Pezomi)
description:
Control your breathing while dodging death in a dangerous, atmospheric, maze. 

ALTITUDE was originally made for A Game By Its Cover Jam 2020 and based on the beautiful cover by @LorenzoPilia and @a_na_net. However, I missed the deadline, so it is now a game made just for you and I.



Special Thanks goes out to:
Paul, Alex, Milo, Jace, Tate, and my wife for testing this thing.
